Module com.group09.playit
Package com.group09.playit.simulation

Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
com.group09.playit.simulation.Simulation
public class Simulation extends Object
The class Simulation. This class is used to run a round automatically with agents attached for each player. This class functions as the interface between the agents, and the game logic. It can be used to simulate rounds from any given RoundState.

    • simulateAgentAgainstAnotherAgent

      public void simulateAgentAgainstAnotherAgent(Agent agentType1, Agent agentType2) throws NoCardsAvailableException
      Simulate a round with the given agents. The agents will play cards until the round is over. The roundState will be updated after every action.
      Parameters:
      agentType1 - the agent type 1
      agentType2 - the agent type 2
      Throws:
      NoCardsAvailableException

    • simulate

      public void simulate() throws NoCardsAvailableException
      Simulate a round with the agent type specified in the constructor. The agents will play cards until the round is over. The roundState will be updated after every action.
      Throws:
      NoCardsAvailableException
